name: Tower of Creation
description:
Tower of Creation is a small rogue-like game, where you can build your own levels. You shoot bullets from your wand, which then connects to you. This connection deals damage to enemies. Be careful death is permanent.

---- Controls ----

WASD: Move
Left Mouse Button: Shoot

---- Tutorial ----

Build your own level by dragging the rooms on the right side, into the grid. 

Shoot bullets from your magic wand, which then connects to you. This connection deals damage to enemies.

Open chests to make yourself stronger.

---- Notes ----

This game was made entirely by myself for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Download the game for the best experience.

---- Known Bugs ----

If you click on a room on the right in the level editor, the number will be decreased, but you can still drag the room into the grid.

If you shoot while changing rooms, the camera will not be placed in the center of the room. Try to walk out of the room again, then the camera will center itself.
